1 #include "masterslave/manipulation/trajectory/LineTrajectory.h"

3 LineTrajectory::LineTrajectory(Eigen::Affine3d startPosition, Eigen::Vector3d RCM, Eigen::Vector3d firstPoint, Eigen::Vector3d secondPoint, int speed, double cycleTime)
4 {
5  speed_ = speed;
6  cycleTime_ = cycleTime;
7 
8  startPosition_ = startPosition;
9  currentPosition = startPosition;
10 
11  startPositionTrajectory_ = Eigen::Affine3d::Identity();
12  startPositionTrajectory_.translate(firstPoint);
13  startPositionTrajectory_.translate(RCM);
14 
15  endPositionTrajectory_.translate(secondPoint);
16  endPositionTrajectory_.translate(RCM);
17 
18  trajectoryExecutionTime_ = (firstPoint-secondPoint).norm()/speed_;
19  steps_ = floor(trajectoryExecutionTime_/cycleTime_);
20 
21  coefficients[0] = startPositionTrajectory_.translation();
22  coefficients[1] = Eigen::Vector3d::Zero();
23  coefficients[2] = Eigen::Vector3d::Zero();
24 
25  coefficients[3] = 10*(endPositionTrajectory_.translation()-startPositionTrajectory_.translation())/pow(trajectoryExecutionTime_,3);
26  coefficients[4] = -15*(endPositionTrajectory_.translation()-startPositionTrajectory_.translation())/pow(trajectoryExecutionTime_,4);
27  coefficients[5] = 6*(endPositionTrajectory_.translation()-startPositionTrajectory_.translation())/pow(trajectoryExecutionTime_,5);
28 
29 }
30 
31 Eigen::Affine3d LineTrajectory::calculateNextPoint()
32 {
33  if(pathParameterStart_<=1)
34  {
35  currentPosition.translate((startPositionTrajectory_.translation()-startPosition_.translation())/(startPositionTrajectory_.translation()-startPosition_.translation()).norm()*speed_*cycleTime_);
36  pathParameterStart_ += cycleTime_/(startPositionTrajectory_.translation()-startPosition_.translation()).norm()*speed_;
37  return currentPosition;
38  }
39  if(pathParameter_ < steps_)
40  {
41  for(const Eigen::Vector3d &coef : coefficients)
42  {
43  currentPosition.translation() += coef*cycleTime_;
44  }
45  pathParameter_++;
46  return currentPosition;
47  }
48 
49 }
